## Introduction

This vignette show stock prices for publicly-traded life insurance companies for the past x days and compares them to the S&P 500.  

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

The packages needed to run the code to create this vignette are the following:  


- jsonlite
- httr  
- tidyverse

In addition, I used the following packages to process the data and perform other tasks.



```{r}

library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
```
